entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is described as having her face half concealed by a tea towel and throwing a reproachful look at Mrs. Weasley.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is mentioned as being grouped with Hermione, Fred, and George, all looking peculiar with cloths over their noses and mouths.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is mentioned as being grouped with Hermione, Ginny, and George, all looking peculiar with cloths over their noses and mouths.

entities.name: george
entities.description: George is mentioned as being grouped with Hermione, Ginny, and Fred, all looking peculiar with cloths over their noses and mouths.

entities.name: mrs. weasley
entities.description: Mrs. Weasley is described as telling Harry and Ron to cover their faces and take a spray of Doxycide.

entities.name: kreacher
entities.description: Kreacher is mentioned as being old and possibly unable to manage the infestation.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius is described as entering the room carrying a bloodstained bag of dead rats.

relationships.description: Hermione throws a reproachful look at Mrs. Weasley when she mentions Kreacher's infestation.
Sirius defends Kreacher, saying he can manage when he wants to.
